name: Pedro VALENTINE, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DISTRICT ATTORNEY OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Pennsylvania, Robert Shannon Superintendent, SCI-Frackville, Respondents

parties: Pedro VALENTINE, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DISTRICT ATTORNEY OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Pennsylvania, Robert Shannon Superintendent, SCI-Frackville, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of November, 2008, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
961 A.2d 54
Pedro VALENTINE, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DISTRICT ATTORNEY OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Pennsylvania, Robert Shannon Superintendent, SCI-Frackville, Respondents.
No. 137 EM 2008.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 19, 2008.
